text: āṉāl, nī etu paṟṟi aṟivu (ātāram) peṟṟavaṉāka illaiyō ataṉai eṉakku iṇai vaikkumāṟu uṉṉai avviruvarum vaṟpuṟuttiṉāl appōtu nī avviruvarukkum vaḻipaṭa vēṇaṭām; āṉāl ivvulaka vāḻkkaiyil avviruvaruṭaṉum aḻakiya muṟaiyil uṟavu vaittuk koḷ; (yāvaṟṟilum) eṉṉaiyē nōkki niṟpōriṉ vaḻiyaiyē nī piṉpaṟṟuvāyāka - piṉṉar uṅkaḷ (aṉaivaruṭaiya) mīḷutalum eṉṉiṭamēyākum; nīṅkaḷ eṉṉa ceytu koṇṭiruntīrkaḷ eṉpatai (appōtu) nāṉ uṅkaḷukku aṟivippēṉ
